summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 6%) and rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 993 m), feels like temperature (up 2.0°C), outside temperature (up 1.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.0°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 497.6m higher than yesterday, 386.7m lower than the past week, 992.8m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 765m and a peak of 2220m, averaging 1763.3m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, a muggy, humid atmosphere is likely. Drizzle or light rain possible, clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight, and very bright daylight. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
